text: meet uma on a very special day for her
the baptism hundreds of babies are
baptized in Argentina like her every day
but this event in Cordoba has attracted
more attention than usual
uma is the country's first child of a
same-sex couple to be baptized in a
Roman Catholic Church and her godmother
though not present in person is none
other than the President of Argentina
Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner baptizing
who really makes me emotional
it was exciting a great social change I
thank the president for all of this and
that's why we chose her as godmother
because we needed this big step same-sex
marriage was legalized in Argentina four
years ago a move that was resisted by
Pope Francis who was then Archbishop of
Buenos Aires however Pope Francis has
also said that all children have the
right to be baptized
Duggal Shaw BBC News
